Text: I'm down with it. Thanks cousin...your sharing with us means a lot.

Welcome back from your holiday.  

Your legions of fans will be happy to have you back on TPB.

Hello smb, for when the next DoS strikes against TPB, do you post your torrents on other sites?

If yes, which sites please?

Cheers, l214

I used to brother, but I find this interface to be the easiest and also attracts the most downloaders - if or when TPB goes down or away - we'll always find a way to share - been trading since the good ole days on the alt.binaries newsgroups and don't intend to stop :-)

~ peace
